p: 2 g of selected oil, emulgent, and co-emulgent were thermostated and homogenized (37 Â°C, approximately 500 rpm, 1 h) in optimized ratios by a heatable magnetic stirrer. An excess amount of pure baicalin was added to the best pre-concentrate in sealed vials. Henceforth, the investigation was fulfilled as detailed in Section 2.2.
